Class SaleManager

java.lang.Object
model.SaleManager
public class SaleManager extends Object
Manages all product sales/discounts in the store. Handles creation, retrieval, modification, and deletion of sales. Determines the best applicable discount for each product.
Version:
2.0
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SaleManager()
    Constructs a new SaleManager with empty sales list.

  • Constructor Details

    • SaleManager

      public SaleManager()
      Constructs a new SaleManager with empty sales list.

  • Method Details

    • addSale

      public ProductSale addSale(String targetID, String discountType, double discountValue, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Adds a new sale to the system. Automatically generates a unique sale ID.
      Parameters:
      targetID - The product ID or category code
      discountType - The type of discount ("PERCENTAGE" or "FIXED")
      discountValue - The discount amount
      startDate - When the sale begins
      endDate - When the sale ends
      Returns:
      The newly created ProductSale

    • removeSale

      public boolean removeSale(String saleID)
      Removes a sale by its ID.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The ID of the sale to remove
      Returns:
      true if the sale was found and removed, false otherwise

    • endSale

      public boolean endSale(String saleID)
      Ends a sale by marking it as inactive. The sale remains in the system but stops applying to products.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The ID of the sale to end
      Returns:
      true if the sale was found and ended, false otherwise

    • getSale

      public ProductSale getSale(String saleID)
      Gets a sale by its ID.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The ID of the sale to find
      Returns:
      The ProductSale if found, null otherwise

    • getAllSales

      public List<ProductSale> getAllSales()
      Gets all sales in the system (active and inactive).
      Returns:
      A copy of the sales list

    • getActiveSales

      public List<ProductSale> getActiveSales()
      Gets all currently active sales. Filters sales by their active status and date range.
      Returns:
      A list of active sales

    • getBestSaleForProduct

      public ProductSale getBestSaleForProduct(Product product)
      Gets the best applicable sale for a product. Returns the sale with the highest discount amount. Handles both direct product matches and category-wide sales.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to find the best sale for
      Returns:
      The best ProductSale, or null if no sales apply

    • getDiscountedPrice

      public double getDiscountedPrice(Product product)
      Gets the discounted price for a product. Automatically finds and applies the best applicable sale.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to get the discounted price for
      Returns:
      The discounted price, or original price if no sales apply

    • hasActiveSale

      public boolean hasActiveSale(Product product)
      Checks if a product has any active sale.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to check
      Returns:
      true if at least one active sale applies to this product

    • clearExpiredSales

      public int clearExpiredSales()
      Clears all expired sales from the system. Removes sales whose end date has passed.
      Returns:
      The number of expired sales removed

    • updateNextSaleID

      public void updateNextSaleID(int newNextID)
      Updates the next sale ID counter. Used when loading sales from file to maintain proper ID sequencing.
      Parameters:
      newNextID - The new starting value for next sale ID
